name: The Menagerie..
description:
-  You wake up in a wet place and try to understand what is happening.

INFORMATIONS:

-  Translated to PT-BR.

-  A prototype of an idea.

-  Unique 5 minute gameplay  experience, so no screenshots to avoid spoilers.

INSTALL INSTRUCTIONS:

-  Unzip "The_MenagerieV1.2.rar"  and run the executable: "The Menagerie.exe" located in "Windows no editor".

CONTROLS:

-  Move the character: W-A-S-D.

- Run: Left shift.

- Move the camera: Mouse .

- Zoom with camera: Mouse scroll.

- Skip dialog: Space bar key.

- Interact: Left mouse button.
